name: PASSUR Aerospace
short_description: PASSUR Aerospace, Inc., a business intelligence company, provides predictive analytics and decision support technology for the aviation industry in the United States and internationally.
long_description: PASSUR Aerospace, Inc., a business intelligence company, provides predictive analytics and decision support technology for the aviation industry in the United States and internationally. It offers data aggregation and consolidation, information, decision support, predictive analytics, collaborative solutions, and professional services. The company also provides various solutions for traffic flow management, diversion management, flight predictability, surface management, turn time management, connectivity and collaboration, and aviation fees and charges. It serves airlines, airports, governments, and other aviation related companies through its direct sales force. PASSUR Aerospace, Inc. was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut.
